about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am Christian Rangel, a Computer Science Engineer who led Astroapp, a mobile application developed from design to deployment, satisfying all of the client's needs.
about.p2: I aim to design robust projects that combine innovation and empathy, offering pocket-friendly solutions and applying artificial intelligence to improve user experience.

job1.title: Full-Stack Developer (Astroapp Project)
job1.description: I led the full development of “Astroapp” —from UX/UI design and prototyping to technology selection (Flutter, Dart, Firebase) and final deployment— collaborating closely with the client to understand and solve their fundamental needs.

job2.title: Backend Developer
job2.description: Implementing an AWS monitoring system to manage EC2 instances, I performed data validation with Flask and PostgreSQL, and automation with Docker in Linux environments. I provided valuable reports to management by identifying errors in logs and improved operational visibility.

contact.title: Get in Touch
